Verses: 1 avan Raajyapaarampannum Onbadhaam Varusham Paththaam Maadham Paththaanthedhiyile Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarum Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvamum Erusalemukku Virodhamaai Vandhu, Adharku Edhire Paalayamirangi, Sutrilum Adharku Edhiraagak Koththalangalaik Kattinaargal.
2 appadiye Sidhekkiyaa Raajaavin Padhinoraam Varushamattum Nagaram Mutrikkai Podappattirundhadhu.
3 naalaam Maadham Onbadhaanthedhiyile Panjam Nagaraththile Adhigariththu, Dhesaththin Janaththirku Aagaaram Illaamarpoyitru; Nagaraththin Madhilil Thirappu Kandadhu.

4 appozhudhu Kaldheyar Nagaraththai Soozhndhirukkaiyil, Yuththamanushar Ellaarum Raaththirikaalaththil Raajaavudaiya Thottaththin Vazhiyaai Irandu Madhilgalukku Naduvaana Vaasalaal Thappi, Avargalum Raajaavumaai Samanaana Boomiyai Nokki Odipponaargal.
5 kaldheyarin Raanuvaththaar Raajaavaip Pin Thodarndhu Erigovin Samanaana Boomiyil Avanaip Pidiththaargal; Appozhudhu Avanudaiya Raanuvamellaam Avanai Vittu Sidharippoyitru.
6 avargal Raajaavaip Pidiththu, Avanai Riplaavilirukkira Baabilon Raajaavinidaththukkuk Kondupoi, Avanai Nyaayandheerththu,
7 sidhekkiyaavin Kumaararai Avan Kangalukku Munbaaga Vetti, Sidhekkiyaavin Kangalaik Kurudaakki, Avanukku Irandu Venkala Vilangugalaip Pottu, Avanai Baabilonukkuk Konduponaargal.

8 aindhaam Maadham Ezhaandhedhiyile Nebugaadhnechchaar Ennum Baabilon Raajaavin Paththonbadhaam Varushaththile, Baabilon Raajaavin Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Ennum Kaaval Senaapadhi Erusalemukku Vandhu,
9 karththarudaiya Aalayaththaiyum, Raajaavin Aramanaiyaiyum, Erusalemin Sagala Kattadangalaiyum, Periya Veedugal Ellaavatraiyum Akkiniyaal Sutteriththu Vittaan.
10 kaaval Senaapadhiyodirundha Kaldheyarin Raanuvaththaarellaarum Erusalemai Sutrilum Irundha Alangangalai Idiththuppottaargal.

11 nagaraththil Meedhiyaana Matra Janaththaiyum, Baabilon Raajaavin Vasamaaga Odi Vandhuvittavargalaiyum, Matra Janakkoottaththaiyum, Kaaval Senaapadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Siraigalaagak Kondu Ponaan.
12 dhesaththil Ezhaiyaana Silarai Dhraatchaththottakkaararaagavum Payiridunkudigalaagavum Vittirundhaan.

13 karththarudaiya Aalayaththilirundha Venkalath Thoongalaiyum, Adhilirundha Aadhaarangalaiyum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilirundha Venkalak Kadalthottiyaiyum, Kaldheyar Udaiththup Pottu, Avaigalin Venkalaththaip Baabilonukku Eduththukkonduponaargal.
14 seppuchchattigalaiyum, Saambal Paaththirangalaiyum, Kaththigalaiyum, Thoobakalasangalaiyum, Aaraadhanaikkaduththa Sagala Venkalap Panimuttugalaiyum Eduththukkondaargal.
15 suththap Ponnum Suththa Velliyumaana Thoobakalasangalaiyum Kalangalaiyum Kaaval Senaapadhi Eduththukkondaan.
16 saalomon Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkaagap Pannuviththa Irandu Thoongalum, Oru Kadalthottiyum Aadhaarangalumaagiya Andha Sagala Panimuttugaludaiya Venkalaththirkum Niraiyillai.

17 oru Thoonin Uyaram Padhinettu Muzhamaayirundhadhu; Adhinmel Adharku Moondrumuzha Uyaramaana Venkalath Thalaippum Undaayirundhadhu; Kumizhile Sutrilum Seyyappattirundha Pinnalum Maadhalampazhangalum Ellaam Venkalamaayirundhadhu; Matrath Thoonum Adhin Pinnalum Adhaippol Irundhadhu.
18 kaaval Senaapadhi Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Seraayaavaiyum, Irandaam Aasaariyanaagiya Seppaniyaavaiyum, Vaasalkaakkum Moondru Kaavarkaararaiyum Pidiththaan.

19 nagaraththile Avan Yuththa Manusharin Visaarippukkaaranaagiya Pradhaani Oruvanaiyum, Raajaavin Mandhirigalile Nagaraththil Agappatta Aindhuperaiyum, Dhesaththin Janaththai Sevagam Ezhudhugira Thalaivanaana Raanuvachchambiradhiyaiyum, Dhesajanaththile Nagaraththil Agappatta Arubadhuperaiyum Pidiththaan.
20 avargalaik Kaaval Senaapadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Pidiththu, Riplaavil Irukkira Baabilon Raajaavinidaththukkuk Konduponaan.
21 avargalai Baabilon Raajaa Aamaath Dhesaththin Pattanamaana Riplaavile Vettik Kondrupottaan; Ippadiye Yoodhaa Janangal Thangal Dhesaththilirundhu Siraiyiruppukkuk Kondupogappattaargal.
22 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar, Yoodheyaadhesaththil Meedhiyaaga Vaiththa Janaththinmel, Saappaanin Kumaaranaagiya Akeekkaamin Magan Kedhaliyaavai Adhigaariyaaga Vaiththaan.

23 baabilon Raajaa Kedhaliyaavai Adhigaariyaaga Vaiththadhai, Sagala Raanuva Servaikkaararum Avargaludaiya Manusharum Kettapodhu, Avargal Mispaavil Irukkira Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Vandhaargal; Avargal Yaarenil, Neththaniyaavin Kumaaran Ismavelum, Kareyaavin Kumaaran Yoganaanum, Neththoppaaththiyanaagiya Thankoomeththin Kumaaran Seraayaavum, Maagaaththiyanaana Oruvanudaiya Kumaaran Yasaniyaavum Avargal Manusharume.

24 appozhudhu Kedhaliyaa Avargalukkum Avargal Manusharukkum Aanaiyittu: Neengal Kaldheyarai Sevikka Bayappadavendaam; Dhesaththilirundhu Baabilon Raajaavai Seviyungal; Appozhudhu Ungalukku Nanmai Undaagum Endraan.

25 ezhaam Maadhaththile, Raajavamsaththile Pirandha Elisaamaavin Kumaaranaagiya Neththaniyaavin Kumaaran Ismavel Paththu Manusharodekooda Vandhu, Kedhaliyaavaiyum, Avanode Mispaavilirundha Yoodharaiyum, Kaldheyaraiyum Vettik Kondrupottaan.
26 appozhudhu Siriyorum Periyorumaagiya Janangal Yaavarum Senaapadhigalum Kaldheyarukku Bayandhadhinaale Ezhundhu Purappattu Egipthirkup Ponaargal.

27 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeenudaiya Siraiyiruppin Muppaththezhaam Varusham Pannirandaam Maadham Irubaththezhaandhedhiyile, Evilmerodhaak Ennum Baabilon Raajaa, Thaan Raajaavaana Varushaththile, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeenai Siraichchaalaiyilirundhu Purappadappanni, Avan Thalaiyai Uyarththi,
28 avanode Anbaaip Pesi, Avanudaiya Singaasanaththaith Thannode Baabilonilirundhu Raajaakkalin Singaasanangalukku Uyaramaaga Vaiththu,
29 avanudaiya Siraichchaalai Vasthirangalai Maatrinaan; Avan Uyirodirundha Sagala Naalum Niththam Thanakku Munbaaga Bojanampannumpadi Seydhaan.
30 avan Uyirodirundha Naalellaam Avanudaiya Selavukkaaga, Raajaavinaal Kattalaiyaana Anudhinath Thittaththinpadi, Anudhinamum Kodukkappattuvandhadhu.
